Author: hollowberry_
Text: truly the worst feeling in the world is a failed purge. because of the damage that this was doing, i pretty much always pave the way with a ton of ice cream before anything else when i binge. you haven't asked for advice, but the last time i did this i tried to use the feeling of how much i hated myself to propel me away from the behaviour at least for a little while. and when i returned to it (i wish you to avoid this part somehow) i was better at it because i made sure it never happened again that i couldn't p... sometimes i have nightmares about bingeing but not being able to purge. truly i can relate to how shitty it feels :( i'm sorry you are hurting so much. sending love.
